platformFeatures.title: Multi-Tenant Architecture
platformFeatures.description: Powerful multi-tenant system allowing multiple stores to run on a single platform with complete isolation and custom domain mapping.

platformFeatures.title: Custom Domain Mapping
platformFeatures.description: Each tenant can use their own custom domain with automatic SSL certificate provisioning and DNS configuration support.

platformFeatures.title: Highly Scalable
platformFeatures.description: Built on modern cloud infrastructure that scales automatically based on traffic and resource needs.

platformFeatures.title: API-First Design
platformFeatures.description: Complete RESTful API and GraphQL support for seamless integration with mobile apps, third-party services, and custom frontends.

platformFeatures.title: Multiple Payment Gateways
platformFeatures.description: Integrated support for Stripe, PayPal, and other major payment processors with easy configuration.

platformFeatures.title: Advanced Inventory Management
platformFeatures.description: Real-time inventory tracking, low stock alerts, and multi-warehouse support for efficient stock management.

platformFeatures.title: Built-in Analytics
platformFeatures.description: Comprehensive analytics dashboard with sales reports, customer insights, and performance metrics.

platformFeatures.title: SEO Optimized
platformFeatures.description: Built-in SEO tools including meta tags, sitemaps, structured data, and URL optimization for better search rankings.

platformFeatures.title: Mobile Responsive
platformFeatures.description: All templates are fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices, tablets, and desktops.

platformFeatures.title: Enterprise Security
platformFeatures.description: Bank-level security with SSL encryption, PCI compliance, regular security audits, and data backup.

platformFeatures.title: Easy Customization
platformFeatures.description: Flexible theming system and drag-and-drop page builder for easy customization without coding.

platformFeatures.title: 24/7 Support
platformFeatures.description: Round-the-clock customer support via email, chat, and phone with dedicated account managers for enterprise plans.

offerings.title: SaaS Rental
offerings.description: Subscribe to our platform and get your online store up and running in minutes. Choose a template, select a plan, and point your domain to start selling.

offerings.title: License Purchase
offerings.description: Buy only the features you need. Get the source code for specific modules and deploy on your own infrastructure with full control.

offerings.title: Ready Backend
